CodeList.Name: Date Imputation Flag

Description.TranslatedText: Date Imputation Flag: Indicates the level of imputation reflected in a date value.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Day Imputed: Day is imputed.
Month Imputed: Month and day are imputed.
Year Imputed: Entire date (year, month and day) is imputed.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC ADaM Date Imputation Flag Terminology

Description.TranslatedText: Derivation Type: Analysis value derivation method.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Average: A data derivation technique which calculates a subject's average value over a defined set of records.
Best Case: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the best possible outcome.
Baseline Observation Carried Forward: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the subject's nonmissing baseline observation.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Baseline Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Best Observation Carried Forward: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the subject's best-case nonmissing value.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Best Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Endpoint: A data derivation technique which calculates a subject's analysis end point value.
Interpolation: A method of imputation involving a missing value that is between known values and is estimated by a function of those known values.
Last Observation Carried Forward: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the subject's previous nonmissing value.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Last Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Maximum: A data derivation technique which calculates a subject's maximum value over a defined set of records.
Minimum: A data derivation technique which calculates a subject's minimum value over a defined set of records.
Maximum Likelihood: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with estimates that maximize the probability of observing what has in fact been observed.
Mean of Other Group: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the mean value from a comparator or reference group.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Mean of Other Group Imputation Technique

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Mean Observed Value in a Group: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the mean value observed in a group of subjects.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Mean Observed Value in a Group Imputation Technique

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Penultimate Observation Carried Forward: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the subject's next-to-last nonmissing value.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Penultimate Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Screening Observation Carried Forward: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the subject's nonmissing screening observation.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Screening Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Worst Case: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the worst possible outcome.
Worst Observation Carried Forward: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the subject's worst-case nonmissing value.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Worst Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Worst Observed Value in a Group: A data imputation technique which populates missing values with the worst value observed in a group of subjects.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Worst Observed Value in a Group Imputation Technique

Description.TranslatedText: Parameter Type: Indicates whether the parameter is derived as a function of one or more other parameters.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Derived: Indicates that a parameter is derived as a function of one or more other parameters.

CodeList.Name: Time Imputation Flag

Description.TranslatedText: Time Imputation Flag: Indicates the level of imputation reflected in a time value.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hours Imputed: Entire time (hours, minutes and seconds) is imputed.
Minutes Imputed: Minutes and seconds are imputed.
Seconds Imputed: Seconds are imputed.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC ADaM Time Imputation Flag Terminology
